help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.

options.command: The command you need help with

signup.description: Posts a Signup message into a specific channel

error.missing_arguments: There are arguments missing, see `$0help signup` for more information
error.voiceDescription: The channel needs to be a Text channel!
error.eventDesc:
The Event `$0` at `$1` already exists.
To delete the event, please execute `$2deletesignup "$0" $1`
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

options.channel: The channel the Event will be posted in
options.event_date: The date of the Event (Format DD.MM.YYYY)
options.event_time: The time of the Event (in UTC)
options.event_desc: The description shown in the Event Signup message
options.event_is_cta: If this event is a cta

deletesignup.description: Deletes an Event registered with the `$0signup` command

error.sql_desc: Something went wrong. I could not find the event or couldn't delete it.
error.args_desc: There are Arguments missing. See `$0help deletesignup`.
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

unavailable.description: Retrieves unavailable users from an Event registered with the `$0signup` command

error.sql_desc: Something went wrong. I could not find the event.
error.args_desc: There are Arguments missing. See `$0help unavailable`.
error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

add.description: Adds a ZvZ Role to a Discord User and adds a Discord Role to the User
add.title: Roles added

error.role_desc:
One or more Roles do not exist.
`$0`
error.discorddesc: Something went wrong while adding the Discord-Role to $0

check.description: Returns Roles of a Discord User
check.title: Roles of $0

clear.description: Clears all ZvZ Roles of a Discord User and removes Discord Role
clear.title: Roles cleared

error.discorddesc: Something went wrong while removing the Discord-Role from $0

remove.description: Removes a ZvZ Role from a Discord User
remove.title: Role removed

error.sql_desc: Something went wrong. I could not communicate with the database.

attendance.description:
List all players, that missed at least 2 cta-events
or returns missing players for a specific event

success.title: Attendance Tracker
success.description: A list of players and how many events they missed (out of all events registered)
success.limit_desc: A list of players and how many events they missed (out of the last $0 events)

attendance.missing_parameter: Missing Parameters, you need to specify the event name, event date and event time

error.formatDesc:
Your Date and/or Time are in the wrong format.
Make sure you follow DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM

attendance.description_event: Following players didn't react to the Event "$0" at $1 $2
attendance.event_date_desc: The date of the Event (Format DD.MM.YYYY)
attendance.event_time_desc: The time of the Event (Format HH:MM in UTC)
attendance.event_count_desc: The number of recent events to check

start.description: Marks a player as on vacation

remove.description: Removes the latest vacation entry for a player

check.description: Check if player is currently on vacation

error.title: Internal Error
error.description: Something went wrong. I could not communicate with the database.

optimalparty.title: Optimal Party Setup
optimalparty.description: Returns the optimal party setup if every registered player signed up.
optimalparty.desc: This is the optimal Party Setup if $0 players signed up.

signup.already_signed_up_desc: You already signed up for this Event.
signup.edit_description: Please react with the given emoji to select which information you want to edit

error.dmChannel: <@$0> Seems like I am not allowed to send you a message. Make sure you allow users from this server to send you messages in the `Server Privacy Settings`
error.sql_desc:
There was an error saving your data.
Please contact Scorix#0001 with a screenshot of this conversation.

success.title: Successfully signed up
success.description: We successfully signed you up for the upcoming event.

signout.confirmation_desc: We have successfully signed you out from the upcoming event!
signout.error_desc: There was an error while signing you out.

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
error.generic_error: There was an Error executing the command `$0$1`.
error.general_format:
Your command is not well formated:
`$0<Command> [args] [--<option> [option-arg]]`
error.args_format:
Your arguments are not well formated.
*Hint: Arguments with spaces must be surrounded by one " and cannot contain any additional "*
error.params_format:
Your options are not well formated.
*Hint: Options must start with '--' and __can__ contain one additional argument.*

labels.usage: React with the shown number to execute that command!

party.title: Party Setup
party.description: This is the Party Setup for the Event I have replied to.
